title.english: A Bridge to the Starry Skies

description:
Kazuma has moved to a small town in the country. On his first day at school, he meets Ui when he is lost his way. They go to school together, but Kazuma accidentally slips and kisses Ui.... To make matters worse, Ibuki, Ui's close friend, sees it.... Well, what will happen to his new school life...?

(Source: ErogeShop)
synonyms: Hoshizora - Ponte para o Céu Estrelado

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

node.description:
[Twitter ](https://twitter.com/aitter_smz)

Ai Shimizu is a Japanese voice actress and professional wrestler. She has a career as a singer, signed to Lantis. She has released 14 singles (including joint and character singles) and four albums. She covered Yumi Matsutoya's "Toki o Kakeru Shōjo" as the B-side of her first single "Angel Fish" in 2003. She is known to have a close relationship with Mai Nakahara, having collaborated in eight anime where most of the characters they voiced in together had close connections: DearS, Kage Kara Mamoru!, My-HiME, My-Otome, My-Otome Zwei, Please Twins!, Sola, Strawberry Panic! and the Lucky Star drama CD. Shimizu has worked sporadic professional wrestling matches since December 2013
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/zappago)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/zappago)

Feng is a Visual Novel studio company. Their works usually leaves an opening ending, depending on who the player choices.     Past Works:  Hoshizora e Kakaru Hashi  Akaneiro ni Somaru Saka  Aozora no Mieru Oka

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/nomico_honey) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/nomico-honey/) 

__Nomico__, alternatively stylized as Nomiko, is a Japanese voice actress and singer affiliated with the office Traumerei.
Freelancer originating from Studio Look.
Freelancer originating from Studio Look.

__Height:__ 156cm

[Blog](http://ameblo.jp/aobaringorongoronstundup/) | [Wiki](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ringo_Aoba) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/aobaringo)

She is an adult game voice actress and a singer. She is currently a freelancer, but used to be affiliated with Rock 'n' Banana until July 1st, 2013.

[Profile](http://www.artsvision.co.jp/talent/697/) | [Blog](http://blog.livedoor.jp/eriko_diary/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/eriko_co_log) | [Wiki](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eriko_Nakamura)

She is a voice actress (seiyuu) currently affiliated with Arts Vision. Co-hosted the popular weekly radio show Odoroki Sentai Momonoki Five (おどろき戦隊モモノキファイブ) with fellow voice-actress [Hikasa Youko](https://anilist.co/staff/102263) from 2009 to 2017.
Animator turned director.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ryohka_jp) | [Website](http://www.ryohka.jp/)

An illustrator, mostly known for her work on character designs for adult visual novels.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/325492584) | [Sakugabooru](https://www.sakugabooru.com/post?tags=tatsuya_yoshihara)

Freelance animator formerly affiliated with [Actas](https://anilist.co/studio/60/) where he was attending its internal animation school and debuted as animator at the age of 20. His work has been greatly influenced by contemporary Kanada school animators [Seiya Numata](https://anilist.co/staff/124320/) and [Hironori Tanaka](https://anilist.co/staff/103979/). 

He's a precocious talent, debuting as episode director at the age of 21 and as director at the age of 23 with [Arve Rezzle](https://anilist.co/anime/13863/), as part of the Young Animator Training Project.

Married to fellow animator [Kikuko Sadakata](https://anilist.co/staff/105769).

[Official Website ](http://www.ariamusic.co.jp/) | [Twitter ](https://twitter.com/agematsu)

Noriyasu Agematsu is the founding member of the musical group Elements Garden.

Along with his fellow Elements Garden members, he is the composer and arranger for the BanG Dream! franchise, including overseeing music production for its anime.
Wakabayashi Mitsuru is a composer and arranger.

[Official Website ](http://www.ariamusic.co.jp/) | [Twitter ](https://twitter.com/agematsu)

Noriyasu Agematsu is the founding member of the musical group Elements Garden.

Along with his fellow Elements Garden members, he is the composer and arranger for the BanG Dream! franchise, including overseeing music production for its anime.
Fujima Hitoshi is a composer and arranger.

__[Blog (JP)](https://junkot.exblog.jp/)__

__Junko Tsuji__ is a Japanese lyricist, composer, arranger and chorus performer.

__[Profile (Melonest)](http://melonest.com/creators/kusano.html)__

__Yoshihiro Kusano__ is a Japanese guitarist, composer and arranger.

Hiromi Mizutani is a composer and arranger from Nagoya, Japan.  In addition to Zill O'll -infinite- and Yuusha 30, Hiromi Mizutani also composed music for the game Red Seeds Profile, known as Deadly Premonition outside of Japan.  He is a member of Team-MAX along with Yasuharu Takanashi, Kenji Fujisawa, Hiroshi Motofuji, Shuji Katayama and REMI.

__[Blog (JP)](https://junkot.exblog.jp/)__

__Junko Tsuji__ is a Japanese lyricist, composer, arranger and chorus performer.
